name: Swiss Avro RJ100 Beautiful Departure from Zurich (with ATC)
description:
A beautiful take  off from Zurich onboard Swiss Avro RJ100 HB-IYQ, operating flight LX754 to Luxembourg on July 29 2016.

Video filmed from seat 2A in business class.

Full flight video: Coming soon

Airline:  Swiss
Flight:  LX754
Aircraft: Avro RJ100 HB-IYQ
From:  Zurich (ZRH)
To:  Luxembourg (LUX)
Departure:  13:36
Arrival:  14:22
Flight Time:  00:46
Seat:  2F
Flight Path:  https://goo.gl/3TD8f4


✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Cameras: 
Window footage: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
You need this for the suction mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
Scanner for ATC: Yupiteru MVT-7300
Recorder for ATC: Olympus VN-741PC http://amzn.to/2fb4Lab
